description: man seen from back, holding a can in his PR hand and a cigarette in his PL hand, arms outstretched; cloud of smoke and sparks in front of man; parked cars at left and right covered in debris
marks: Signature, Title and Edition on back, in black ink: [1/7  Fourth of July Chinat
title: Fourth of July, Chinatown and Little Italy, Man Drinking to Explosion, No. 2, New York City
